resources.string: Display a dot where you may place a piece
Computer plays Green, Blue and Yellow
Click above picture to watch demo on Tencent Video

-- 4 players having each 21 pieces and players need to place as many pieces as possible on the board with 20 * 20 squares. \n-- The first piece needs to be placed at the corner of the board. \n-- Every piece after the first should to be placed in contact with the corners of one of your own pieces and never touch any edge of pieces!

-- The game ends when each user is unable to place a piece. \n-- The score for each user is the sum of the areas of the pieces on the board.The sum of the largest pieces is the victor. \n-- If it is still unclear, you can click the picture below to watch the teaching video via Tencent video website.
